display_long_description:
🏆**Winner of UploadVR's Best Mixed Reality Game of 2025**🏆

From the creators of **Little Cities** comes **Little Critters**, a casual tower defense game where you fortify your room with super-smart traps to defend against the oncoming critter horde!

👾 Put virtual traps on your real-world furniture or on the ceiling, walls, or floor. Combine traps together to create new strategies!

[media]

👾 Hands-on action lets you pick up critters, throw or squash them. Just be careful, they can bite fingers!

[media]

👾 Discover new critter types and unlock new traps and weapons as you navigate through tougher waves of difficulty.
[media]

👾 Arm yourself with a slingshot to help with your defenses.

[media]

👾 Your high-tech robot buddy guides you through your critter pest-control problem!

[media]

**Little Critters adapts to different room shapes & sizes. For the best experience play with a space of at least 2m x 2m.**

Follow us **@PurpleYonder** on TikTok, Instagram, X and Bluesky for updates!
